but you need to have balls to do this job.

bank shares will fall by half.

How are you? How about lunch?
Etna. You were sleeping like a log. Didn't want to wake you. Time's a-wasting.

With your weak heart, you shouldn't do that.

출발하기 전에 사러 갈 게 있으니까

Today, I have some business to take care of.

ANNA WHY ARE YOU NOT REPLYING?

when your entire life is based on taking everything with force,

This is not a fucking joke, okay?
[in English] Okay, you wait here. Just one minute.
What the hell are you wearing?
A couple thousand euro of yours.
translation.ko: 당신 돈 2천 유로 주고 산 건데?

translation.en: Are you afraid that I am too good at it?
translation.ko: 내가 그거 너무 잘할까 봐 겁나?

translation.en: and could get inside me without taking it off.
translation.ko: 벗길 필요도 없이 내 안에 들어올 수도 있잖아

translation.en: You will be mine. I guarantee it.
translation.ko: 넌 내 여자가 될 거야, 장담하지

translation.en: Then I'll do anything I want,
translation.ko: 그럼 난 원하는 건 뭐든 해

translation.en: I'm going to fuck you so hard, you won't be able to sit.
translation.ko: 아주 제대로 떡 쳐서 앉지도 못하게 해줄게

translation.en: [Mario, in Italian] I told you a thousand times.
Are you aware who you have shot, Massimo?
translation.ko: 네가 누굴 쐈는지 알기나 해, 마시모?

translation.en: Do you know what you've done?
[Massimo] I couldn't just sit there and watch.
This means war. A war between two powerful families.
translation.ko: 이건 전쟁이야 막강한 두 가문의 전쟁

translation.en: The only thing you can do is to get rid of Laura.
translation.ko: 네가 할 수 있는 건 라우라를 버리는 것뿐이야

translation.en: Do that and ask Anna for forgiveness.
translation.ko: 그렇게 한 다음 안나한테 용서를 구해

translation.en: And get rid of this damn boat, too.
[Laura] What's going on? Did you kill him?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이야? 그 사람 죽였어? - 당신이 알 바 아냐

translation.en: -[Massimo] It's none of your business. -You killed him?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이야? 그 사람 죽였어? - 당신이 알 바 아냐 당신이 죽였어?

translation.en: I shot his hands. I wouldn't have had to do it
translation.ko: 손을 쐈지 당신이 창녀처럼 그런 쇼만 안 했어도 그럴 필요 없었어

translation.en: if you didn't dress like a whore and put on your little show.
translation.ko: 당신이 창녀처럼 그런 쇼만 안 했어도 그럴 필요 없었어

translation.en: So, that's my fault that your friend tried to rape me?
translation.ko: 당신 친구가 날 겁탈하려 한 게

translation.en: -[in English] Fuck off! Leave me alone. -Where you going?
-Stop it. Where are you going? -No. Get off me.
[Massimo] I'm so grateful that you're alive.
But in the same time, I wanna kill you.
translation.ko: 하지만 그와 동시에 당신 죽이고 싶어

translation.en: Thank God I was so close.
I can't lose you. I don't want to.
translation.ko: 당신 잃을 수 없어, 그러기 싫어

translation.en: I just wonder if you aren't too tired for an evening surprise.
translation.ko: 당신이 너무 피곤해서 저녁에 깜짝 선물 못 받을까 봐

translation.en: Are you fucking crazy? I have nothing to wear!
do you mind if I ask you to dance with me?
[in English] The first and real love of Massimo.
I'll take the most precious thing you have.
translation.ko: 난 당신의 가장 소중한 걸 뺏을 거거든

translation.en: I left her the day you landed in Sicily.
translation.ko: 당신이 시칠리아에 온 날 내가 안나를 떠났지

translation.en: Your portraits have been hanging in my house for years.
translation.ko: 당신 초상화들이 내 집에 오랫동안 걸려 있었으니까

translation.en: Nobody believed that I will ever find you.
translation.ko: 내가 당신을 찾아낼 거란 걸 아무도 안 믿었지

translation.en: And... she didn't believe at all.
I will never let anyone hurt you.
translation.ko: 아무도 당신 못 건드리게 할 거야

translation.en: Domenico will take you to the airport tomorrow.
You said that you want to visit your family.
-Yes, but-- -There's an apartment waiting for you
I wasn't talking to you. I'll call you back.
I am going to kill you!
Just tell me one thing, okay?

translation.ko: 대체 시칠리아에서 뭔 일이 있었던 거야?

translation.en: -Martin. I had enough of him. -Did he piss you off?
translation.ko: - 마르틴을 더는 견딜 수 없었어 - 너 열받게 했어?

translation.en: Jesus, I know it sounds ridiculous. I didn't want it, but things happened.
translation.ko: 어이없겠지, 나도 알아 근데 원치 않은 일이 일어났어

translation.en: Don't make me force it out of you. Tell me, who is it?
translation.ko: 내 성질 건드리지 말고 좋은 말로 할 때 불어, 누구야?

translation.en: What do you mean? He's got special needs? Is he sick?
I know, he has flat feet.
Imagine a strong alpha male, who always knows what he wants.
translation.ko: 원하는 건 언제든 가질 수 있는 우두머리 수컷이

translation.en: He is your caretaker and your defender.
When you are with him, you feel like a little girl.
translation.ko: 함께 있으면 소녀가 되는 느낌이 들고

translation.en: He makes all your sexual fantasies come true.
What's more, he is one meter, 90 centimeters tall,
has absolutely no body fat, and has been molded by God himself.
translation.ko: 군살이라곤 하나도 없는 신이 빚은 몸매야

translation.en: Did God mold his dick, too?
He comes from a rich, traditional Sicilian family.
They don't take foreigners for wives.
Right, now spare me the bullshit.
I was kidnapped by a gangster, and then I fell in love with him.
translation.ko: 깡패한테 납치되곤 그 남자랑 사랑에 빠졌어

translation.en: And the worst thing is that they keep me in the dark.
translation.ko: 게다가 뭐가 최악인지 알아? 난 아무것도 모른단 거야

translation.en: They treat me like some kind of doll.
They sent me to Poland, and I still don't know a single thing.
translation.ko: 폴란드로 보내졌는데 뭐가 뭔지 하나도 몰라

translation.en: That's why you need to fucking back out. Do you understand?
Fuck all the Massimos, Martins, and all the other mozzarellas.
translation.ko: 마시모니, 마르틴이니 모차렐라치즈니 다 좆 까라고 해

translation.en: Darius, just fucking look at you! Please, don't leave, though.
Can you tell me why you woke me up in the middle of the night? It's 1:00 p.m.
translation.ko: 한밤중에 왜 깨우고 난리야? 지금 몇 신지 알아? 오후 1시라고

translation.en: Greg, I want some volume here.
What? Did you suddenly have a stroke?
I was offered the position of general manager at Preston.
translation.ko: 나 프레스톤 호텔 총지배인 자리 제의받았어

translation.en: You will be fucking General Preston!
Great. Mozzarella turned her brain into pesto.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 모차렐라 처드시고 대가리가 페스토 된 거야?

translation.en: Now, that is some serious volume.
You're right. I'm not going to just lie down and smell nice.
translation.ko: 네 말 맞아, 가만 누워서 좋은 냄새나 풍기진 않을 거야

translation.en: I'd like to lie down and smell nice...
There is a line to your ass.
It's for you. From that gentleman.
translation.ko: 한 잔 드세요 저쪽 신사분이 드리래요

translation.en: Where were you all this time?
I have nothing to say to you.
Laura, please. At least let me explain, and then I'll leave.
translation.ko: 라우라, 설명은 하게 해 줘 떠나도 그 후에 떠날게

translation.en: Explain how your dick ended up in a different girl's ass?
translation.ko: 어떻게 딴 여자한테 네 물건이 들어갔는지?

translation.en: The moment you ran off from that pool...
I thought this through. You were right. I ran after you, but you weren't there.
translation.ko: 상황에 대해 생각했고 네가 옳단 걸 깨달았지만 쫓아가도 넌 안 보였어

translation.en: I started looking for you. It got dark, so I went back to the hotel.
I found your letter, read it... and lost my mind.
translation.ko: 네 편지를 발견했어 그걸 읽고 이성을 잃어

translation.en: I decided I needed to get fucked up. I called Michał...
that fucking first drink was the last thing that I remember from that evening.
translation.ko: 첫 잔을 마신 후의 그 밤 기억은 하나도 안 나

translation.en: It doesn't change a thing if you remember or not.
translation.ko: 기억이 있든 말든 바뀌는 건 없어
'하지만'은 없어, 마르틴! 그런 건 없는 거야, 알아들어?

translation.en: We belong to two different worlds. There is no room for a woman in your life.
translation.ko: 우린 다른 세상에 사는 거야 너한텐 여자를 위한 자리는 없어

translation.en: And I am not going to be your toy. Do you understand?
translation.ko: 난 네 장난감은 안 될 거야 알겠어?

translation.en: But that is in the past.
-But I don't miss you. -So, it was all fake?
translation.ko: - 난 안 그리웠어 - 그럼 다 거짓이었어?

translation.en: It wasn't fake, but it wasn't a healthy relationship.
-Honey, let's talk. -We have nothing to talk about!
translation.ko: - 자기야, 얘기 좀 해 - 우린 할 얘기 없어!

translation.en: No! You have already told me what you had to say.
translation.ko: 아니, 해야 할 얘기는 이미 다 나한테 했어

translation.en: [Massimo, in English] I don't understand what you two are saying,
translation.ko: 두 사람이 무슨 말을 하는진 못 알아듣겠지만

translation.en: but it's rather clear that she wants you to leave.
translation.ko: 여자분은 그쪽이 가 주길 원하는 것 같은데요

translation.en: Do I have to say it so you'll understand?
But I think you've already met Martin.
translation.ko: 당신은 이미 마르틴을 만난 것 같지만

translation.en: [in Polish] Martin, come in! Come in, please!
Do you have any idea what I've been through?
-♪ All this magic in the air ♪ -No.
-Wanna bet? -♪ Secured my place, I'm here to stay ♪
But do me a favor, and don't tell them exactly what you do.
translation.ko: 하나만 부탁할게 무슨 일 하는지는 말하지 마

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
[in Polish] Laura! You look great as a blonde!
[in English] Massimo. Nice to meet you.
[in Polish] Who is he? And what does he do?
[in English] My mom is asking what do you do for a living.
[laughs] Really? You will be the first in our family.
translation.ko: 그래요? 그럼 우리 가족의 1호 갱스터가 되겠네요

translation.en: So, what are your intentions with our daughter?
[in English] Sorry we didn't wait for you, but I have to travel to Palermo.
translation.ko: 먼저 시작해서 미안해 팔레르모에 가야 하거든

translation.en: It's okay. I'm not hungry yet.
Domenico will take you to the doctor.
nobody from Poland can come to our wedding.
translation.ko: 우리 결혼식에 폴란드에선 아무도 못 온다고

translation.en: You said it yourself that you don't want them to know what I do.
translation.ko: 내가 하는 일 알리고 싶지 않다고 한 건 당신이었어

translation.en: But I would love to have my best friend to be next to me.
translation.ko: 근데 절친은 곁에 있어 주면 좋겠어

translation.en: I think you don't like me, Mario.
that you have caused some commotion...
translation.ko: 우리 가족에 소란을 좀 피운 거

translation.en: [in Polish] What a ride! Fuck me!
translation.ko: 차 멋지다! 완전 간지가 좔좔 넘치네! 이게 웬일이니?

translation.en: I can't believe it! Are you fucking out of your mind?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 너 정신 나갔어?

translation.en: You have known each other for two months!
translation.ko: 둘이 알게 된 지 겨우 두 달이야!

translation.en: I'll smoke two for your sake.
translation.ko: 네 몫까지 두 대 피울 거야

translation.en: I don't get it. He forced you, right?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼 그 사람이 강요했지?

translation.en: I'll tear him apart when I see him!
translation.ko: 나타나기만 해 봐 아주 찢어 놓을 테니까!

translation.en: Olga, he doesn't know I'm pregnant!
translation.ko: 올가, 그 사람은 나 임신한 줄 몰라!

translation.en: He doesn't. And when he proposed, I said yes willingly.
translation.ko: 그리고 나한테 프러포즈했을 때 기꺼이 예스라고 했어

translation.en: Laura, you are trapped in a cage!
Don't you see it? It's a golden cage, but you are still a fucking prisoner!
translation.ko: 모르겠어? 황금의 덫 넌 아직 빌어먹을 포로라고!

translation.en: Do you know what you are up against?
translation.ko: 대체 지금 네가 뭘 하는 건지 알기나 해?

translation.en: What are you talking about? A cage?
-What am I supposed to do? -I don't know.
Stop yelling. Do you take me for a fool? You think I didn't know what I was doing?
translation.ko: 소리 그만 질러, 내가 바보야? 뭐 하는지도 모르는 줄 알았어?

translation.en: I love you, do you hear me?
I will always be there for you.
We will raise the child together.
It will be a beautiful child with beautiful parents.

translation.ko: 똑똑할진 모르겠지만 생긴 건 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: [in Polish] How long do we have to wait?
How long can you pamper yourself?
I want to be with him and keep the child.
translation.ko: 그 사람 옆에서 아기 키우고 싶어

translation.en: [Laura, in Polish] Well, you could stay for a while in Sicily.
translation.ko: 너 여기서 한참 있다가 가도 돼

translation.en: What do you think I am here for?
[Olga] Okay, stop talking me up. Just call him.
translation.ko: 그만 얘기하고 그 사람한테 전화나 해

translation.en: [Massimo] How long does it take to try on a dress?
translation.ko: 드레스 하나 입어보는 데 얼마나 걸리는 거야?

translation.en: [in English] Can we talk after dinner?
-[in Italian] Where is Massimo? -By the swimming pool.
